content:
I'm beyond thrilled to hear that! You're all set for an amazing adventure in Seoul! It's been my pleasure to help you plan your trip and share my knowledge with you.

I'm sure you'll have an incredible time exploring Seoul's vibrant neighborhoods, trying all the delicious food, and taking in the stunning views. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need any further recommendations.

Remember to stay curious, be open-minded, and soak up every moment of your trip. Seoul is a city that will leave you with unforgettable memories, and I'm sure you'll fall in love with its energy and charm.

Safe travels, and I hope you have a fantastic time in Seoul!
